commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Chika wanted sweets. I thought it highly probable that she would return to the clubroom to get some after splitting up with Ruby.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Right as I reached out for the sweets, Umi burst out of the door in the back. I nearly had a heart attack!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I really don't know what to do with you. There was no need to go as far as you did, Chika. We intended to share the sweets with you!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Huh? R-Really? We could've had some?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Yes, of course. And you were well aware of this fact, weren't you, Chika? I believe Rin informed you of this.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Gulp*

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Why did you get in touch with Chika?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Since we already had plans to hang out with Chika and Ruby after practice, we wanted to invite them to have snacks with us, too.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Chika, you knew we'd get sweets all this time! I can't believe you didn't tell me. You're so mean!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I-I'm sorry! All I wanted was to surprise everyone a little. I didn't think it'd cause all this commotion. I'm really sorry!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I still don't trust you.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Okay, okay, that's enough scolding for now. Let's have some snacks! I brought a ton. See? Ta-da!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Wow! That's amazing. The whole desk is buried in sweets!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Giggle* And that's not all. Setsuna also... Huh?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: They're gone. Setsuna's sweets are gone. How?! Did I lose them somewhere?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: E-Excuse me!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Huh?! It's Setsuna! What is it?!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Setsuna! I'm so sorry! I think I lost the sweets you gave me somewhere.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Don't worry. See? I've brought them with me.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: You left them behind in the clubroom. My meeting ended early, so I went back to school. I was very surprised when I saw these sitting on the desk.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: R-Really?! I'm so sorry, Setsuna. I'm so glad I didn't actually lose them, though.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Emma, Setsuna, thank you for all of these treats. Let's have at them right away. Rin, please call over Honoka and the others.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Roger!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Emma and Setsuna, please join us. And also...you too, Ruby.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Can I really?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yaaay! Snack time!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Not you.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Emma came all the way from Nijigasaki to bring us these treats, and all you've done is cause trouble. Your punishment will be no snacks! Wait quietly for us over there.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Whaaat?! No way!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: It looks like you ran into a wolf after all.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Giggle* Isn't she a cute little wolf, though?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Whine* I want snacks, too!
